title: Square Root

title: Square Root
text: $$\sqrt{4}=2$$, and $$\frac{8}{4}=2$$, so $$\sqrt{8}=2\sqrt{2}$$. Remember to take the +/- values.
speech: the square root of 4 is equal to, 2 , and  8 fourths, is equal to, 2 , so  the square root of 8 is equal to, 2 the square root of 2 . Remember to take the +/- values.
